create_account.title: Create your wallet
create_account.description: Use your personal mobile phone to create your wallet

validate_wallet.title: Validate your wallet
validate_wallet.description: Validate and access your wallet by verifying your identity.

create_passkey.title: Create a passkey
create_passkey.description: A passkey allows you to connect to your wallet in a very secure way (without having to enter your private key). You can manage several passkeys so you can connect from different devices.
create_passkey.alert_title: We won't be able to recover your passkeys
create_passkey.alert_description: Make sure you create your passkey on a personal device.
create_passkey.save_title: Your new passkey has not been saved yet!
create_passkey.save_description: To save the passkey, you need to authenticate with one of your existing credentials.

signature_request.title: You are signing:
signature_request.warning_content: Only sign this message if you fully understand the content and trust the requesting site.

wallet_overview.content_alert: We strongly recommend to create a passkey from other devices, as this is the only way to recover your wallet if you lose your current passkey.

settings.content_alert: Generate a new passkey to access your wallet from another device.

confirm_transaction.fee_message: Gas fees will be applied to this transaction

receive_tokens.warning_content: Only send MATIC or other ERC-20 tokens to this wallet

form.email_description: This email will be use for notification. It can be different from your authentification email. You will be able to change it whenever you want.

error.title: Error
error.an_error_occured: Please try refreshing the page, or return back later.

authentication.login: You have been logged in successfully
authentication.logout: You have been logged out successfully

file_input.title: Profile picture
file_input.description: We recommend that you use an image of at least {{recommandedWidth}} x {{recommandedHeight}} pixels and that it is no larger than {{maxMbSize}} MB. Import a PNG or JPEG file.
